library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

price <- function(q) {
  return( 90 - 2*q )
}

cost <- function(q) {
  return(100+2*q^2)
}

market <- data.frame(
  quantity=c(0:20)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    price = price(quantity),
    cost = cost(quantity)
  )


marketNarrow <- market %>%
gather(variable,value,price:cost)


ggplot(marketNarrow,aes(quantity,value,colour=variable)) + geom_line() + ylim(c(-100,200))
